item.title: Bangladesh: A Country Under Revolution!
item.description: “For a routine job, you need Clerks. For a battle, you need Soldiers. For a war, you need Generals. For a World War, you need Field Marshals. But for a Revolution, you need common men and women, millions of them, with a common dream.” â€” Tarif Haque More than Hundred Killed & Thousands Injured, Curfew Declared Right now, my country, Bangladesh, is undergoing a long awaited revolution. It started as a very simple demonestration by some students for fair and logical reform of the quota system for government jobs.
